anya-e1001n6:5_0: Gavaṁ ce taramānānaṁ, ujuṁ gacchati puṅgavo;
anya-e1001n6:6_0: Sabbā gāvī ujuṁ yanti, nette ujuṁ gate sati.
anya-e1001n6:9_0: So sace dhammaṁ carati, pageva itarā pajā.
anya-e1001n6:10_0: Gavaṁ ce taramānānaṁ, ujuṁ gacchati puṅgavo;
anya-e1001n6:11_0: Sabbā gāvī ujuṁyanti, nette ujuṁ gate sati.
anya-e1001n6:13_0: So sace dhammaṁ carati, pageva itarā pajā;
anya-e1001n6:14_0: Sabbaṁ raṭṭhaṁ sukhaṁ seti, rājā ce hoti dhammiko.
